Do the calibration using Anipose and then use Freemocap 

    1. Calibration (either in anipose or free mocap) 
    2. Mediapipe for 2D 
    3. Anipose for 3dD to reach 3D triangulation. 
        (blender export function for 3D animation)

    We ecommend either Freemocap, Pose2Sim or DeepLabCut in the manuscript. 

Check on Sarka for Pose2Sim
